title: AI Creates Stunning 3D Art
caption:
AI Creates Stunning 3D Art

New AI model generates photorealistic 3D scenes from text prompts in seconds

#AIArt #GenerativeAI #DigitalArt #FutureOfArt #CreativeAI #ArtificialIntelligence
imagePrompt:
futuristic, cyberpunk, neon-lit, glowing, ultra vibrant digital art illustration showing "AI Creates Stunning 3D Art",

    Instagram square format 1024x1024, professional quality, eye-catching composition,
    dramatic lighting, ultra high quality, trending on artstation
